axisId.description: The id of the axis used for the reference value.

classes.description: Override or extend the styles applied to the component.

label.description: The label to display along the reference line.

labelAlign.description: The alignment if the label is in the chart drawing area.

labelStyle.description: The style applied to the label.

lineStyle.description: The style applied to the line.

spacing.description: Additional space arround the label in px. Can be a number or an object { x, y } to distinguish space with the reference line and space with axes.

x.description: The x value associated with the reference line. If defined the reference line will be vertical.

y.description: The y value associated with the reference line. If defined the reference line will be horizontal.

root.description: Styles applied to the root element.
